EmailTemplate.name: Return shipping from different loca.
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We saw your note about shipping back from a location that is different from where you received your package. Thank you! We've made arrangements with our shipping department to include the correct return lable so your order gets back to us in a timely fashion. We appreciate your letting us know!
Warm Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName} BorrowLenses.com Verifications Team verify@borrowlenses.com (844) 853-6737 x4
